title: Video: Mmoths â€“ Thnx
content:
With the release of his new self-titled EP just around the corner (March 6), Irish beatmaker Mmoths has dropped a new video to accompany one of the cuts set to feature on the five track outing.

Thnx is a drone influenced affair, manipulating and toying with the ethereal atmosphere that Mmoths is renowned for conjuring up, which is in turn echoed by the visuals. Mirroring each and every shot, with few of the idyllic scenes hovering on the screen for longer than a few seconds, Feel Good Lost have once again hit the nail on the head, with this unique, and perfectly fitting video. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
